entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Thursday 6 April 2023
